pr_title: FM2-133: Initial implementation of related person resource

timeline.bodyText: Why are we adding this new extension here?
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText:
Why are we adding this new extension here?

I am adding an identifier to refer to person-A by UUID. This is what I thought of. If you have a better way of doing this that would be great.
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

replies.bodyText: I can't think of a better way than using an extension off-hand, but what I would do is 1. rename this to something like "RelatedPerson" and 2. change the data stored into a proper reference, e.g., Person/<UUID>, so it's a little more like a standard FHIR data type.
replies.author: ibacher
